oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Education
Children: Writing
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: 10 pages taken out of a lined notebook, containing punishment writing exercises of repeated sentences, presumably by a student. Towards the end of the pages and the final lines of each page the writer got tired of writing the same sentence, and the writing is becoming more and more blurred and sloppy. Here and there another hand, much more meticulous, presumably that of the teacher, corrected the words, but to no avail Â– the student kept his mistakes in the following lines.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Writing exercise
